# MIAH: Traditional & Innovative Fashion Brand in Bangladesh

> MIAH is a Bangladeshi fashion brand that combines cultural tradition with modern design, offering Bengali clothing such as panjabis, sarees, lungis, and stylish wear for local and global customers.

Website: https://miah.shop/
Update Date: 02 Sep 2025
Version: 0.3

MIAH crafts authentic Bangladeshi clothing that reflects Bengali heritage with a touch of modern style. The brand designs outfits for prayers, festivals, and everyday use. Collections include panjabis for occasions, handwoven sarees, soft lungis, and casual wear for customers in Bangladesh and worldwide.

## Men's Collection

- [Panjabi Collection](https://miah.shop/men/panjabi): Ceremonial shirts worn during Eid festivals, puja celebrations, weddings and religious gatherings
- [Lungi Collection](https://miah.shop/men/lungi): Comfortable wrap-around garments that Bengali men wear at home and during relaxation
- [Shirts](https://miah.shop/men/shirt): Everyday shirts suitable for office work, social meetings and casual outings
- [T-Shirts](https://miah.shop/men/t-shirt): Cotton T-shirts in drop cut, oversized, and regular fits for modern, casual, and everyday wear.
- [Pants](https://miah.shop/men/pants): Comfortable bottoms including joggers for exercise, chinos for semi-formal events, and cargo styles

## Women's Collection

- [Saree Collection](https://miah.shop/women/saree): Six-yard draped garments worn during weddings, festivals and special ceremonies
- [Salwar Kameez](https://miah.shop/women/salwar-kameez): Three-piece outfits with tunic, pants and dupatta for daily wear and formal events
- [Abaya Collection](https://miah.shop/women/abaya): Long robes that provide modest coverage for prayer, work and social occasions
- [Tops](https://miah.shop/women/top): Stylish and comfortable tops for women, suitable for casual and daily wear

## Kid's Collection

- [Kids Collection](https://miah.shop/kids): Comfortable and stylish outfits for children and teens, from traditional to modern wear

## Essentials Collection

- [Specialty Items](https://miah.shop/others): Fabric pieces for custom tailoring and traditional gamcha towels for daily use

## Brand Information

- [Company Overview](https://miah.shop/page/company): Story of how MIAH started, core values and commitment to Bengali culture

## Optional

- [Shipping Policy](https://miah.shop/page/shippingPolicy): How orders are delivered within Bangladesh and to international destinations
- [Return Policy](https://miah.shop/page/returnExchange): Steps customers take to exchange items or request refunds
- [Contact Information](https://miah.shop/contact-us): Phone numbers, email addresses and office location details
- [Blog](https://blog.miah.shop/): Articles about fashion trends, styling tips and Bengali cultural traditions
